CustomField.formula:
'' + 'The following task is due today!' + '

' + 'Subject: ' + Subject + '

' + 'Priority: ' + TEXT(Priority) + '

' + 'Status: ' + TEXT(Status) + '

' + 'Related To ' + I_RS_Parent_Object_Name__c + ': ' + I_RS_Parent_Record_Name__c + '

' + 'View record in Salesforce

' + 'This is a system-generated email, please do not reply.'+ ''
CustomField.label: Task to Outlook Sync Event Body SACE
